MS MCQs

    Getting started with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure - Customer narrative

    »

    1. Which assets in the technology portfolio summary aren’t compatible with Azure?

      VMware virtualization

      Linux and other open-source servers

      Windows servers

      All of the above are compatible with Azure.


    2. What risks could prevent Tailwind Traders be successful migrating two datacenters in the next 18 to 24 months?

      Effort and time to migrate the portfolio

      Controls to operate the migrated assets

      Organization of people, teams, and responsibilities

      It depends; all of the above.
